#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Tentena
#Text=Tentena is a town in Central Sulawesi .
#Text=Understand
#Text=Tentena sits on the road between Ampana and Rantepao , on the northern shore of Lake Poso .
#Text=The town itself could be easily overlooked if it were not for the number of guides and locals recommending it as a better option than Poso for an overnight stop .

#Text=The main street might be a little underwhelming , however the various warungs and homes build over the clear lake waters , and the surrounding rice fields give this charming little town a surpsising appeal .
#Text=The community exists on two sides of the lake , connected by a busy concrete traffic bridge and a quieter , wooden foot bridge .
#Text=The main side of the lake is the more commercial area , while the opposite site has a noticeably quieter and more homely feel .
#Text=Tentena is in North Pamona district in the regency of Poso , about 50 km south of regency capital Poso .
#Text=The headquarters of the Central Sulawesi Christian Church are in Tentena .
#Text=Get in
#Text=The arrival point is the Bus Terminal - a simple drop-off point on the side of the road .
#Text=From here it s a 4km walk into the main areas of guesthouses and shops .
#Text=A better option is to flag down a local Ojek ( motorbike taxi ) to take you and your luggage in for IDR 5,000 .
#Text=If you are arriving from Rantepao , ' tourist guides ' will be on hand to suggest accommodation options .

#Text=They are likely to charge you double the normal rate for an ojek ( motorbike taxi ) ride ; however the late arrival of the bus from Rantepao ( anywhere between 8pm and 11pm depending on road conditions )
#Text=IDR 15,000 - IDR 20,000 ( as of Sep 2018 ) .
#Text=Get around
#Text=Ojeks ( motorbikes ) can take you to most local spots for around IDR 5,000
#Text=Bemos ( a minivan , Kijang [ old model Toyota SUV ] , or minibus ] can bring you around .
#Text=See
#Text=Poso Lake : The main attraction within Tentena , which has beautiful clear water , adjacent warungs ( and some home-stays under construction ) and a peaceful vibe .
#Text=2 parallel bridges exist to bring you back and forth .
#Text=Its worth exploring the opposite side of the lake for guesthouses , homestays , and warungs ( kiosk / eatery ) .
#Text=Pamona Cave : Near the city center , on the West side , near the new bridge , off to a small road .
#Text=You would need to squat down and crawl through .
#Text=Remember to bring mosquito repellent .
#Text=Saluopa Waterfall : By all accounts the Saluopa Waterfall -while a little tough to reach , about 12km- is one of the best available ; notable for the lack of other tourists and businesses .
#Text=There are approximately 10 drops , each of which you can bathe in .
#Text=A nice relief from the heat of Sulawesi , and worth if considering if you have time .
#Text=Lore Lindu National Park : Easier to be accessed from Poso , but it is possible to arranged a trip from Victory Hotel for IDR 2,000,000 ( as of Sep 2018 )
#Text=Eat
#Text=Try ' Sigoli ' , a freshwater eel from Lake Poso .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Victory Hotel
#Text=a bit old , but has good , clean rooms in both budget ( IDR 150,000 per person ) and Deluxe ( IDR 250,000 with TV and hot shower ) .
#Text=All prices include breakfast .
#Text=A good option for a single night .
#Text=The hotel is excellent at booking trips and transportation for you ( Email : victorytentena@yahoo.com ) .
#Text=Tropicana
#Text=Online Rock Cafe ( under construction )
#Text=If you 're in town for a few nights , the opposite side ( West side ) is worth exploring for the peaceful atmosphere ( away from the traffic and ' bussle ' )
#Text=superior views of the lake and nearby farmlands , and good range of warungs ( kiosk / eatery ) .
#Text=Go next
#Text=All connections in Tentena are made from the Bus Terminal , 4km out of town .
#Text=Ojeks ( motorbike taxi ) are easily chartered to take you and your luggage to the Terminal for Rp 5,000 .
#Text=To Rantepao : Bus connection ( 10-12 hours , Rp 170,000 ) ( as of Sep 2018 ) .

#Text=To Ampana : You need to take Ojeks ( motorbike taxi ) or Bemos to Tentena Bus Terminal to Poso ( 2 hours , IDR 40,000 ) , and then transfer to Bus to Ampana ( a further 4 hours from Poso , IDR 70,000 ) or another Bemos ( IDR 80,000 - IDR 100,000 ) ( as of Sep 2018 ) .
#Text=Taxis and private vehicles will hover by the Poso Bus station trying to convince you that the Bus is not available .
#Text=Predictably , once it is apparent you intend to wait for the bus , the price of Taxis and Private vehicles will become more competitive ( sometimes the same price as a bus seat ) .
#Text=Private care can be arranged for IDR 800,000 - IDR 1,200,000 ( as of Sep 2018 ) .
